contentrichtext.text: The term '''American System''' can mean one of the following: * [[American system of manufacturing]], for a system of manufacturing developed in America. * [[American System (economic plan)]], for the program of [[Henry Clay]] and the [[Whig Party (United States)|Whig Party]]. * [[American School (economics)]], for the Hamiltonian American School of which the American System (economic plan) is a part. * [[United States customary units]], a system of measurement used in the United States {{disambig}}
